title: MCVXYZ
author: MCVXYZ
created_time: March 17, 2023, 04:17:56 PMLast edit: March 18, 2023, 09:46:05 AM by MCVXYZ
content: Today I was thinking about what are the good,hidden effects of bitcoin's rise in society...As I understand the first and the most important thing is - the will to educate yourself. no doubt that  who were previously not interested for example in trading have now taken an interest in this field, with some even making it a full-time job, even my friends, some of them were soccer players and didn't even know anything about economics. it also has forced people to think critically about money and how it works, sparking debates and discussions about the role of government in the economy.When trader analyzes the situation he is not only think about economy,but politics.Moreover, Bitcoin's technology, blockchain, has been hailed as a game-changer in various industries, from finance to logistics, and even politics. This has led to an increase in interest in technology and its impact on various sectors, leading to more people educating themselves on technology-related subjects.So my advice for beginners is that not to waste time and start educating yourselves right now. bitcoin is not just an  asset but new way to encourage yourself and gather energy to read right things everyday about: how money works,politics,history,trading,social-cultural activities and etc.It would be interesting from old members to share their experience: what did you get beside s the financial wealth? Did all of these things change the way you think?

comments.author: wajik-tempe
comments.body: Bitcoin has had a profound impact on many people's lives beyond just financial wealth, with its potential to change the way we think about money, technology, and community.some early Bitcoin investors have become more financially independent, allowing them to pursue their passions and interests without being tied to a traditional 9-to-5 job. This has led to increased freedom and flexibility in their lives. The effects of Bitcoin's rise can be far-reaching and can have a significant impact on an individual's personal growth and development. However, as with any investment, it's essential to do your research and make informed decisions.

comments.author: un_rank
comments.body: Quote from: MCVXYZ on March 17, 2023, 04:17:56 PM what did you get beside s the financial wealth? Did all of these things change the way you think?Financial awareness. On average, most people live their lives without any worry as to how money works and only bother on how to file their taxes. I unsurprisingly have not gained financial wealth or freedom from bitcoin yet, cause I am still stacking sats, but I have learnt a lot on how the financial world ticks and what I have been doing wrong for so many years. I am also reading more financial books to acquire more knowledge. Yes, it definitely has changed the way I think. Which should be same for everyone that actually apply themselves here.- Jay -
